title: Introducing OpenAI Dublin
summary: OpenAI is expanding its presence in Europe with a new office in Dublin, Ireland. The company plans to grow its team in Ireland to support operations, trust and safety, go-to-market, security engineering, and legal work. OpenAI aims to collaborate with the Irish government and industry to advance AI development and deployment. The company has already provided access to its technology and mentorship to Irish youth accelerator Patch. OpenAI's investment in Ireland confirms the country's focus on building a flourishing AI ecosystem.
